this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet tools and materials - 5 mm crochet hook - bernat premium #4 worsted medium yarn - any colour - yarn needle - paper clip - scissors final size - width of 4 5 cm and height of 4 cm technical notes *only round 1 is joined with a slip_stitch *the slip_stitch is worked into the first stitch of the round not one of the chains *at the end of each round is a stitch count in brackets *stitch count does not include chains or the slip_stitch join in round 1 *link to the youtube video is at the bottom of the pattern heart any colour round 1 make a magic_ring chain 1 into the magic_ring make 9 half_double_crochet join with a slip_stitch 9 sts *for round 2 make only 2 stitches in each stitch around round 2 make 1 tight chain make 1 slip_stitch and 1 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet 1 double_crochet 2 single_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet and 1 half_double_crochet and 1 slip_stitch 17 sts fasten_off and flip over and pull pull tight and tie a weave the yarn leave a 20 cm yarn the yarn tail into knot tail to the bottom tail the back of the of the heart heart attach the heart to tie a knot and the paper clip weave the yarn tail into the heart to hide it link to video https //youtu be/vxn75ccjdp0 if you need help or have any questions feel free to message me i will respond as soon as possible and answer or clarify any questions you may have
